articles.title: A woman who killed her in-laws with toxic mushrooms allegedly poisoned her spouse too - NPR
articles.description: Erin Patterson was convicted last month of killing her estranged husband's relatives with a meal laced with toxic mushrooms. Newly unsealed evidence alleges she previously poisoned his meals too.

articles.title: Private Equity Firms Celebrate Trump’s Executive Order Giving Them The Keys To Retirement - Forbes
articles.description: Private asset managers have been tantalized for years about the $29 trillion in Americans’ retirement accounts. Donald Trump just made it easier for them to get a slice.
